response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $750,000. This is a significant discount from its true worth, making it a fantastic investment for someone like you who appreciates quality and exclusivity. I believe this product could greatly enhance your life or business, and I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection or operations. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 750000}
